jobs.title: Sales/biz dev tech Mid level
jobs.description:
Altio is looking for a very motivated sales/biz dev candidate with great ambition

About us: Altio is a fintech that just raised its seed funding and is based in the Google Campus and the Techhub London. The team is composed on ex Rothschild, UBS and State Street and is looking to revolutionise investment banking.
We are all very dedicated and working very hard 6 days a week with the best people in the market.
If you are interested, apply by sending your CVs or links to the work you have done and the reasons of your motivation to recruitment@altiotech.com

You need to have the right to work in the UK!
